content.body: Luca Casonato: did you see https://github.com/heycam/webidl/pull/526? I'm somewhat curious what Deno/Node.js make out of ShadowRealms and the additional "non"-JS globals to be exposed therein
content.formatted_body: Luca Casonato: did you see https://github.com/heycam/webidl/pull/526? I'm somewhat curious what Deno/Node.js make out of ShadowRealms and the additional "non"-JS globals to be exposed therein
